text: Carlos Reiche (aka Karl F. Reiche) was a German Botanist. He took his doctorate at the University of Leipzig, and was a professor at the University of Dresden. He worked at the National Museum of Chile, being director of Department of Botany. He held a profesorship in Mexico, then lived in Monaco, went back briefly to Mexico, and returned to GermanyBo Beolens, Michael Watkins, Michael Grayson The Eponym Dictionary of Amphibians ==Works== Geografía botánica de Chile Rafael Sagredo Baeza. –1ª ed..– Santiago de Chile: Cámara chilena de la construcción: Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile: Dirección de Bibliotecas, Archivos y Museos, C2013. Translated by Gualterio Looser. ==References== Category:German botanists Category:1860 births Category:1929 deaths
title: Karl Friedrich Reiche
